report.title: Trending people for an event
report.description: Gives a list of top 10 recent contributors, with their number of records. Ideal for populating a 'trends cloud'.
report.query: SELECT *, greatest(11, cast((15 - (sqrt(#records_to_scan#) / sqrt(records)))*2 as integer)) as font_size FROM ( SELECT case position(',' in recorders) when 0 then recorders else regexp_replace(recorders, '(.+), ', '') || ' ' || regexp_replace(recorders, ',(.+)', '') end as recorders, count(id) as records FROM (SELECT co.id, co.recorders FROM cache_occurrences co WHERE co.survey_id=#survey_id# AND co.date_start>='#date_from#' AND co.date_start<='#date_to#' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #records_to_scan#) list GROUP BY recorders ORDER BY count(id) DESC LIMIT #recorders_to_return# ) AS list ORDER BY recorders ASC

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
